justification: “In the response-locked event-related potential (ERP), similar performance monitoring processes have been operationalised as the amplitude of the error-related negativity (ERN).”

construct: negative affect elicited by errors or conflict

justification: “Startle is potentiated after errors… further suggesting that erroneous actions prime negative affect.”
